title: In COVID-19, escalated- vs. prophylactic-dose anticoagulation does not reduce mortality and increases major bleeding.
abstract: Ortega-Paz L, Galli M, Capodanno D, et al. Safety and efficacy of different prophylactic anticoagulation dosing regimens in critically and non-critically ill patients with COVID-19: a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials. Eur Heart J Cardiovasc Pharmacother. 2021. [Epub ahead of print.] 34519777.
